forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. West wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As night cloaks Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere bears an unmistakable air of tranquility. Tonight's cloud cover has muted the otherwise vibrant city lights, presenting a canvas of soft shadows punctuated by the occasional twinkle of illumination. The temperature gently cradles around 51 degrees, with a mild west wind lightly rustling through the streets, adding a fresh sprinkle of moisture to the air. The marine layer seems to be rolling in, wrapping the iconic skyline and the Golden Gate Bridge in a shroud of mystery, though it is not insistent this time—no foghorns reverberate through the night—just a subtle, cool embrace that invites one to linger outside.

As the dawn approaches, expect the sun to break through the layers of clouds, heralding a pleasant day ahead. Tuesday promises a shift in mood, beckoning with sunshine and a high temperature near 62 degrees. This transformation invites you to don layers—perhaps a light jacket to ward off morning chill, giving way to a comfortably casual t-shirt as the day warms. Consider a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the blend of waterfront views and fresh air rejuvenates the spirit, or perhaps enjoy a leisurely brunch at a local café, watching the world awaken. With such inviting conditions, the day is yours to explore—gently nudging you toward simple pleasures amidst the charm of a waking city.
